explains: adv. 无助地；无法控制地

sentences.en: Cross-currents can sweep the strongest swimmer helplessly away.
sentences.cn: 即使最强壮的游泳者也会无助地被交叉水流冲走。

sentences.en: They helplessly watch the crops being flooded.
sentences.cn: 他们眼睁睁地看着庄稼被水淹了。

sentences.en: During the interview, she fumbled helplessly for words.
sentences.cn: 面试时她支支吾吾找不出适当的话语。
